page.syntax: Context.Security.AddUserToRole as L (UserName as C, RoleName as C)

argument.name: L
argument.description: Return type, .T. if the role was added; otherwise .F.

argument.name: RoleName as C
argument.description: The name of the role to which the user will be added.

page.description: Adds a user to the supplied role.
page.discussion: Context.Security.AddUserToRole() adds a user to the supplied role. Check Context.Security.CallResult.Success before using the return value.
